Test Description: Navigate to Dashboard and verify interface
Test Steps:
1. Login to application with valid credentials
2. Verify automatic redirection to Dashboard page
3. Check that Overall Task Status widget displays
4. Verify Completed Task Status widget is visible
5. Confirm Task Types widget shows data correctly
Expected Result: Dashboard loads with all widgets visible and functional

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Task data available
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Dashboard and locate task widgets
2. Record counts from Overall Task Status widget
3. Navigate to actual modules and verify counts
4. Compare widget data with source module data
5. Verify data consistency across all widgets
Expected Result: Task widgets display accurate data matching source modules

Test Steps:
1. Record dashboard widget counts and totals
2. Navigate to Document module and verify actual counts
3. Navigate to Workflow module and verify counts
4. Create new document and return to dashboard
5. Verify dashboard widgets update automatically
Expected Result: Dashboard data consistent with module data and updates in real-time

Test Description: Navigate to Document module and verify interface
Test Steps:
1. Login and navigate to Document module
2. Verify Document List tab displays correctly
3. Check grid columns and sub-tabs are visible
4. Verify All, My Documents, Pending Task tabs
5. Test sorting functionality by clicking column headers
Expected Result: Document module interface displays with proper navigation and controls

Test Description: Create new document with valid data
Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Document module accessible
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Document module and click New Document
2. Fill in document title and description
3. Add document content and tags
4. Select appropriate category and properties
5. Save document and verify success message
Expected Result: Document created successfully and appears in document list

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Document module accessible
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Document module and click Upload button
2. Select valid file from local system
3. Fill in required metadata fields
4. Add tags and set document properties
5. Complete upload and verify success
Expected Result: File uploaded successfully and document appears in list

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Document module and locate document
2. Click Edit button to open editing form
3. Modify title, description, and content
4. Update tags and properties as needed
5. Save changes and verify success message
Expected Result: Document updated successfully with changes reflected

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Document module and locate document
2. Select document and click Delete button
3. Confirm deletion in confirmation dialog
4. Verify success message appears
5. Check document is removed from list
Expected Result: Document deleted successfully and removed from list

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Document module
2. Enter search criteria in search field
3. Apply search filters if available
4. Verify search results accuracy
5. Clear search and verify reset functionality
Expected Result: Search returns accurate results matching criteria

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Document module
2. Use filter dropdown options
3. Apply various filter criteria
4. Verify filtered results are accurate
5. Test Reset Filter functionality
Expected Result: Document filtering works correctly for all criteria

Test Steps:
1. Login and navigate to Template module
2. Verify Template List tab displays
3. Check New Template tab is available
4. Verify grid columns and filter options
5. Test template list functionality
Expected Result: Template module interface displays correctly with all options

Test Description: Create new template with valid data
Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Template module accessible
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Template module and click New Template
2. Fill in template name and description
3. Configure template fields and properties
4. Set template category and permissions
5. Save template and verify creation
Expected Result: Template created successfully and appears in template list

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Template module and locate template
2. Click Edit button to open template editor
3. Modify template name, description, and fields
4. Update template properties and settings
5. Save changes and verify success
Expected Result: Template updated successfully with changes applied

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Template module and locate template
2. Select template and click Delete button
3. Confirm deletion in confirmation dialog
4. Verify success message appears
5. Check template is removed from list
Expected Result: Template deleted successfully and removed from list

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Existing template present
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Template module and click New Template
2. Enter existing template name in name field
3. Fill other required fields with valid data
4. Attempt to save the duplicate template
5. Verify system prevents creation with error message
Expected Result: System prevents duplicate creation and shows appropriate error

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Template module
2. Enter search criteria in search field
3. Apply template filters by category or type
4. Verify search results accuracy
5. Test filter combinations and reset functionality
Expected Result: Template search and filtering returns accurate results

Test Steps:
1. Login and navigate to Workflow module
2. Verify workflow grid displays correctly
3. Check grid columns and action options
4. Verify filter and search functionality
5. Test workflow list navigation
Expected Result: Workflow module interface displays with proper navigation

Test Description: Create new workflow with valid data
Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Workflow module accessible
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Workflow module and click Create Workflow
2. Fill in workflow name and description
3. Configure workflow steps and properties
4. Set workflow permissions and assignments
5. Save workflow and verify creation
Expected Result: Workflow created successfully and appears in workflow list

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Workflow module
2. Locate existing workflow in list
3. Click View button for workflow
4. Verify workflow details display correctly
5. Check all workflow information is accessible
Expected Result: Workflow details display correctly with all information

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Workflow module and locate workflow
2. Click Edit button to access editing interface
3. Modify workflow properties and settings
4. Update workflow steps or assignments
5. Save changes and verify success
Expected Result: Workflow edited successfully with changes applied

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Workflow module and locate workflow
2. Select workflow and click Delete button
3. Confirm deletion in confirmation dialog
4. Verify success message appears
5. Check workflow is removed from list
Expected Result: Workflow deleted successfully and removed from list

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Workflow with status
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to workflow with defined status transitions
2. Open workflow details or status management
3. Attempt valid status transition
4. Attempt invalid status transition (skip steps)
5. Verify system handles transitions correctly
Expected Result: Valid transitions allowed, invalid transitions prevented with proper messages

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Workflow module
2. Enter search criteria in search field
3. Apply workflow filters by status or type
4. Verify search results accuracy
5. Test filter combinations and reset
Expected Result: Workflow search returns accurate results matching criteria

Test Description: Create new user with valid data
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Admin section and access User Management
2. Click Create User and fill Login ID and Name
3. Enter Email Address and Employee Number
4. Select User Type and Authentication Type
5. Save user and verify creation success
Expected Result: User created successfully and appears in user list

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Admin section and open User Creation
2. Leave mandatory fields empty (Login ID, Name, Email)
3. Skip required User Type selection
4. Attempt to create user
5. Verify validation messages for required fields
Expected Result: Validation messages appear and user creation prevented

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Admin section and access Role Management
2. Click Create Role and fill role name and description
3. Set access level and account type
4. Configure role permissions and hierarchy
5. Save role and verify creation
Expected Result: Role created successfully with proper permissions

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Admin section and access Department Management
2. Click Create Department and fill name and code
3. Add department description and business units
4. Set department properties and manager
5. Save department and verify creation
Expected Result: Department created successfully and available for assignments

Test Description: Create new site with valid data
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Admin section and access Site Management
2. Click Create Site and fill site name and code
3. Add site description and location details
4. Set site properties and contact information
5. Save site and verify creation
Expected Result: Site created successfully and appears in site list

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Admin section and access Tags Management
2. Create new tag with name and description
3. Set tag properties and hierarchy
4. Organize existing tags and update properties
5. Verify tag functionality across modules
Expected Result: Tags created and managed successfully with proper organization

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Admin section and access User Group Management
2. Create new group with name and description
3. Add users to group and set permissions
4. Configure group hierarchy and properties
5. Verify group functionality and member access
Expected Result: User group created successfully with proper member assignments

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Config section and access Workflow Types
2. Create new workflow type with name and description
3. Set prefix code and SLA configuration
4. Assign roles, departments, and lifecycle states
5. Save configuration and verify creation
Expected Result: Workflow type created successfully and available for use

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Config section and access Document Types
2. Create new document type with name and prefix
3. Set numbering system and format settings
4. Configure metadata fields and permissions
5. Save configuration and verify availability
Expected Result: Document type created successfully and appears in dropdown lists

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Config section and access Lifecycle States
2. Create new state with name and description
3. Set state properties and transition rules
4. Configure permissions and notification settings
5. Save state and verify integration
Expected Result: Lifecycle state created successfully and available for workflows

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Config section and access System Data Field Types
2. Create new field type with name and data type
3. Configure field properties and validation rules
4. Set field permissions and usage scope
5. Save field type and verify availability
Expected Result: System data field type created and available in form builders

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Config section and access Checklist Management
2. Create new checklist with name and description
3. Add multiple checkpoints with properties
4. Configure checkpoint dependencies and validation
5. Save checklist and verify functionality
Expected Result: Checklist created successfully with all checkpoints configured

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Config section and access Email Templates
2. Create new template with name and subject
3. Design email content with dynamic variables
4. Configure template settings and permissions
5. Test template and verify functionality
Expected Result: Email template created successfully and available for use

Test Steps:
1. Login and navigate to Repository module
2. Verify Create Repository section displays
3. Check Tree View and Grid View options
4. Verify repository list and file management areas
5. Test repository navigation functionality
Expected Result: Repository interface displays correctly with all management options

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Repository module
2. Click Create Repository button
3. Fill in repository name and description
4. Set repository properties and permissions
5. Create repository and verify success
Expected Result: Repository created successfully and appears in repository list

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Repository module and select repository
2. Click Upload Files button
3. Select multiple files from local system
4. Configure file properties and metadata
5. Complete upload and verify files appear
Expected Result: Files uploaded successfully and accessible in repository

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Files exist in repository
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Repository and select repository with files
2. Test file operations (rename, move, copy)
3. Organize files into folders and categories
4. Update file metadata and properties
5. Verify file management operations work correctly
Expected Result: File management operations work correctly with proper organization

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Repository with files
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Repository module
2. Enter search criteria for files
3. Apply file type and date filters
4. Verify search results accuracy
5. Test advanced search functionality
Expected Result: Repository search returns accurate file results

Test Steps:

Test Steps:

Test Steps:

4. Verify filtered results accuracy

Test Steps:

3. Design template layout and format
4. Configure template variables and fields
5. Save template and verify creation

Test Steps:

2. Click Edit button to open template editor
3. Modify template design and fields

5. Save changes and verify success

Test Steps:

Test Steps:
1. Login and navigate to System module
2. Access Audit Trail section
3. Verify audit trail interface loads
4. Check filter options and date ranges
5. Test audit trail navigation functionality
Expected Result: Audit trail interface displays correctly with all filter options

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Audit data exists
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Audit Trail section
2. Click Select Category Name dropdown
3. Choose specific category option
4. Apply category filter and verify results
5. Test multiple category combinations
Expected Result: Category filtering works correctly showing relevant audit entries

Test Description: Filter audit trail by date range
Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Audit data exists
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Audit Trail section
2. Set From Date and To Date ranges
3. Apply date filter and verify results
4. Test various date range combinations
5. Verify audit entries within specified dates
Expected Result: Date filtering shows accurate audit entries within specified range

Test Description: Filter audit trail by user actions
Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Audit data exists
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Audit Trail section
2. Select specific user from filter options
3. Apply user filter and verify results
4. Test filtering by multiple users
5. Verify audit entries for selected users
Expected Result: User filtering shows accurate audit entries for selected users

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Audit entries exist
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Audit Trail and locate audit entry
2. Click on audit entry to view details
3. Verify all audit information displays correctly
4. Check timestamp, user, action, and object details
5. Test audit entry navigation and display
Expected Result: Audit entry details display completely with accurate information

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Audit data exists
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Audit Trail section
2. Apply desired filters for export
3. Click Export or Download button
4. Select export format and options
5. Verify exported file content and accuracy
Expected Result: Audit trail exported successfully with accurate filtered data

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Audit data exists
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Audit Trail section
2. Enter search criteria in search field
3. Apply search filters and execute search
4. Verify search results accuracy
5. Test various search patterns and terms
Expected Result: Audit trail search returns accurate results matching criteria

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Audit Trail section
2. Perform actions in other modules
3. Return to Audit Trail and verify logging
4. Check that all actions are properly recorded
5. Verify audit completeness and accuracy
Expected Result: System changes properly recorded in audit trail with complete information

Test Steps:
1. Login and navigate to Advanced Search module
2. Verify Search Type dropdown displays
3. Check Select Fields and Condition options
4. Verify search input fields and parameters
5. Test advanced search interface functionality
Expected Result: Advanced search interface displays with all search configuration options

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Advanced Search
2. Select Document from Search Type dropdown
3. Configure search fields and conditions
4. Enter specific search criteria
5. Execute search and verify results
Expected Result: Advanced document search returns accurate results based on criteria

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Known data exists
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Advanced Search
2. Configure exact match conditions
3. Enter precise search terms
4. Execute search and verify exact matches
5. Test exact match accuracy
Expected Result: Exact match search returns only precisely matching results

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Advanced Search
2. Configure partial match conditions
3. Enter partial search terms
4. Execute search and verify partial matches
5. Test partial match functionality
Expected Result: Partial match search returns all relevant results containing search terms

Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Advanced Search
2. Configure multiple search fields and conditions
3. Enter criteria for multiple fields
4. Execute complex search
5. Verify results match all criteria
Expected Result: Multiple criteria search returns accurate results matching all conditions

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Advanced Search access
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Advanced Search
2. Enter invalid search criteria
3. Configure invalid conditions or parameters
4. Execute search with invalid data
5. Verify system handles invalid input gracefully
Expected Result: System handles invalid search criteria gracefully with appropriate messages

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Search results available
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Advanced Search and execute search
2. Verify search results display correctly
3. Click Export or Download button
4. Select export format and options
5. Verify exported file content matches results
Expected Result: Advanced search results exported successfully with accurate data

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Advanced Search access
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Advanced Search
2. Configure complex search criteria
3. Save search criteria with descriptive name
4. Reload saved search criteria
5. Verify saved criteria works correctly
Expected Result: Search criteria saved and reloaded successfully maintaining accuracy

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Both modules active
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to Template module and verify templates exist
2. Navigate to Workflow module and open workflow
3. Locate template linking section in workflow
4. Select and link appropriate template
5. Save workflow and verify template association
Expected Result: Workflow successfully linked with template and association displays correctly

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Document and Workflow exist
Test Steps:
1. Create or locate existing document
2. Navigate to workflow association section
3. Select appropriate workflow for document
4. Configure workflow parameters and assignments
5. Verify document-workflow association works
Expected Result: Document successfully associated with workflow and workflow triggers correctly

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Multiple roles configured
Test Steps:
1. Login with admin user and verify full access
2. Login with editor role and verify limited access
3. Login with viewer role and verify read-only access
4. Test that restricted functions are properly disabled
5. Verify role permissions work consistently across modules
Expected Result: Role-based permissions work correctly across all modules with proper restrictions

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Multiple modules accessible
Test Steps:
1. Create data in one module
2. Navigate to related modules and verify data appears
3. Update data in one module
4. Verify updates reflect in related modules
5. Test data integrity across module boundaries
Expected Result: Data consistency maintained across modules with real-time updates

Pre-Conditions: User logged in, Data in multiple modules
Test Steps:
1. Navigate to global search functionality
2. Enter search criteria that spans multiple modules
3. Verify search results from all relevant modules
4. Test search result navigation to source modules
5. Verify search accuracy across module boundaries
Expected Result: Search functionality works correctly across all modules returning accurate results
